atv.title: ATV (2 players)
atv.description: The ATV is a small and agile vehicle that can seat two players at once. Keep in mind that this vehicle won't be able to transport your whole team, and does not offer much protection while being driven.

rover.title: Tactical Rover (4 players)
rover.description: The ATV is a small and agile vehicle that can seat two players at once. Keep in mind that this vehicle won't be able to transport your whole team, and does not offer much protection while being driven.

suv.title: SUV (4 players)
suv.description: Despite having a slower top speed than the ATV & Rover, the SUV is able to offer much better defense since it only leaves the top half of the squad exposed to enemy fire. This vehicle will make you harder targets for enemies to lock on to!

truck.title: Cargo Truck (4 players)
truck.description: The truck is the largest of the land vehicles and has the greatest protection, but the slowest of all. It only has a driver's seat, but it also has a large platform that the rest of the squad can use!

helicopter.title: Helicopter (4 players)
helicopter.description: If you want to cover more ground much faster, keep an eye out for helicopters in the map! These not only allow you to move quickly across the map, but also lets you move vertically, giving you access to building roofs and other high ground.
